Description: This award recognizes a true champion of cancer research whose leadership and extraordinary achievements in cancer research have had a major impact on the field. Such achievements may include contributions to the acceleration of progress against cancer, raising national or international awareness of the importance of cancer research, or other ways of demonstrating a sustained extraordinary commitment to cancer research.
Location: Ballroom 20 AB - Upper Level - Convention Center
SearchResultBody: LE09. AACR-Margaret Foti Award for Leadership and Extraordinary Achievements in Cancer Research
